articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton calls Sebastian Vettel 'a disgrace' after Azerbaijan GP collision
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton calls title rival Sebastian Vettel "a disgrace" after the Ferrari driver drove into his Mercedes in the Azerbaijan Grand Prix.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Sportsday - transfer news and gossip
articles.description: Updates from Wimbledon qualifying and Eastbourne, the latest transfer news and gossip, as well as the best of social media and debate.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: England v South Africa: Dawid Malan hits 78 as hosts win Twenty20 series
articles.description: England win the Twenty20 series against South Africa as debutant Dawid Malan hits a rapid 78 in a 19-run victory at Cardiff.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: British & Irish Lions 2017: Warren Gatland criticism 'desperate' says Steve Hansen
articles.description: Lions coach Warren Gatland's criticism of New Zealand's treatment of Conor Murray is "desperate", says All Blacks boss Steve Hansen.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Azerbaijan GP: F1 in 2017 just got nasty - and it's Sebastian Vettel's fault
articles.description: Sebastian Vettel driving into Lewis Hamilton was a shocking moment and it has added another dimension to the title battle, says Andrew Benson.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Queen's 2017: Feliciano Lopez beats Marin Cilic in Aegon Championships final
articles.description: Unseeded Spaniard Feliciano Lopez wins the Aegon Championships with victory over Marin Cilic in a final-set tie-break at Queen's.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Queen's 2017: Jamie Murray & Bruno Soares win doubles title
articles.description: Britain's Jamie Murray wins his first Queen's Club title as he and Bruno Soares beat France's Julien Beneteau and Edouard Roger-Vasselin.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Women's World Cup 2017: South Africa beat Pakistan by three wickets
articles.description: Watch highlights from the 2017 Women's World Cup as South Africa defeat Pakistan by three wickets in the third match of the tournament at Grace Road.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Roger Federer beats Alexander Zverev to win Gerry Weber Open in Halle
articles.description: Roger Federer warms up for Wimbledon by beating Alexander Zverev to earn a record ninth title at the Gerry Weber Open.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2017: Change tactics, not personnel - Sir Clive Woodward
articles.description: The British and Irish Lions are totally beatable in the second Test against New Zealand, says former coach Sir Clive Woodward.
